attributes.action: resign from office as an unelected and unrepresentative leader of the british people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The incumbent Prime Minister and his government have betrayed their manifesto pledge and as such no longer have the right to govern on behalf of the British people. It is imperative for the continued democratic process in the United Kingdom that the government be dissolved and a general election be called in order to re-establish the opinions of the British populace within the House of Commons

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
